title: Learn about the interpretation of reading Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of reading Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream to keep away the jinn.

preview.html: Reciting Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream. Does seeing the recitation of Ayat Al-Kursi portend good or bad? What are the negative interpretations of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi, and what does reciting Ayat al-Kursi with difficulty in a dream indicate? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of the dream of reading Ayat al-Kursi for single women, married women, and pregnant women, according to Ibn Sirin and the leading scholars of interpretation. Envy and magic. Seeing a merchant brings him good news about his livelihood and he will soon earn a lot of money. If the dreamer sees the genie in his sleep and reciting Ayat al-Kursi over him, this means that the difficulties that his life is going through will end, his living conditions will improve and he will soon enjoy happiness and contentment. If he is the owner of The dream reads Ayat al-Kursi with difficulty, as this is a sign of a friend who has a grudge against him and harbors bad intentions, the beginning of a beautiful and wonderful phase of life. Reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream as an indication that the dreamer will move to a new house soon in which he will feel comfortable. And happiness, if the dreamer works in a legitimate job and recites Ayat Al-Kursi. This may portend his death soon, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing, and seeing the world symbolizes longevity and improved health. If the dreamer sees a dead person reciting a certain part of Ayat al-Kursi in his dream, this indicates that he will inherit that dead person soon, but he will face some difficulties in this matter. . This indicates that he is currently saving some money to benefit from it in the future. If the dreamer reads Ayat al-Kursi in his dream, this indicates that he has wisdom and intelligence, and these qualities help him succeed and shine in his work and personal life. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google, the dream interpretation site at The Internet includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars.Reading Ayat al-Kursi in an unmarried woman’s dreamInterpretation of a dream of reading Ayat al-Kursi for an unmarried woman means that he will get rid of the magic that he suffered from, but if the dreamer sees someone reading Ayat al-Kursi, this means that this person will help him achieve it. . And progress, and thanks to him, he will overcome many problems and difficulties. If the dreamer reads Ayat Al-Kursi out loud, this symbolizes that she will abandon a certain mistake she committed in the previous period and change for the better and be happy and reassured next to him. Reading Ayat Al-Kursi about jeans in a single woman’s dream. Some commentators said that reciting Ayat al-Kursi on the jinn is a sign that the dreamer is committing sins and harming himself and people, and the vision carries a message for her to hasten repentance and change until the Lord. (The Most High) is pleased with her and pleases her. If the dreamer sees the genie and is not afraid of him, and recites the Throne Verse over him, this will lead to the removal of her worries and change the circumstances of her life for the better soon. What is the interpretation of any chair in a dream for a single woman? An unmarried girl who sees in a dream She recites Ayat al-Kursi as evidence of R

title: Interpretation of seeing a fox in a dream in detail

preview.html: When a dreamer sees a disease in a dream, he panics and does not know its meaning or purpose. Seeing a fox in a dream is an annoying symbol that does not bode well because it is associated with hatred and envy. We will provide you on a website in dreams with all the correct opinions and interpretations of seeing alopecia in a dream, dream interpretation of hair loss, Interpretation of a dream about alopecia for a married woman. I dreamed that my daughter had alopecia and the interpretation of a dream about alopecia is for a man, so follow with us these following lines. Fox in a dream Most interpretation scholars have stated that the interpretation of seeing a fox in a dream leads to eye exposure and envy at that time. Perhaps the ballast in The dream indicates that there are people close to the dreamer who hate him and hate him and do not wish him success. Seeing yourself cured of alopecia in a dream indicates the death of worries, sorrows and problems and the beginning of joys and happy occasions. It is possible that alopecia in a dream is a reflection of the dreamer’s many thoughts or a result of many of his fears about The future and his life. In the event that a person sees that his daughter has alopecia in a dream, this may be a good omen for her in the near future. Seeing alopecia in an unmarried woman’s dream can be a sign of the collapse of her fears, relief of her pain, and an end to her problems. There is an opinion that says Alopecia in a dream and hair loss symbolize great material losses. It is possible that herpes in a dream is a symbol of an insult that the fortuneteller may be subjected to by someone. Interpretation of a dream about a fox in the front of the head is evidence of humiliation, humiliation, loss of prestige and prestige, and perhaps loss of work. The dream symbolizes The presence of a fox on the back of the head indicates difficulty in achieving desires and premature aging. As for alopecia in a dream and hair loss from the right side of the head, it symbolizes the appearance of something sad. See also: Hair loss in a dream, seeing baldness in a dream, Interpretation of a dream about hair loss, Interpretation of a dream about alopecia on the hair symbolizes the ability to The patient can recover from his illness if he suffers from it. It is possible that the interpretation of a dream about alopecia in the hair is a symbol of the end of worries and sorrows and the death of troubles and problems. On the other hand, the interpretation of a dream about vice in the hair symbolizes the dreamer’s encounter with some unfortunate and sad events. Interpretation of a dream about alopecia In the hair and its falling from the front indicates the humiliation and humiliation to which the dreamer is exposed. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman: Interpretation of a dream of a married woman, care, may be a sign that she is suffering from many responsibilities and burdens. It is possible that the interpretation of a dream of a fox for a married woman is a sign of the accumulation of her worries and problems And her sorrows. The interpretation of a dream of a fox for a married woman can be a symbol of the presence of some troubles and problems in her married life. I dreamed that my daughter was afflicted with alopecia. As for the interpretation of a dream of someone who says that I dreamed that my daughter was afflicted with alopecia, this could be one of the praiseworthy and promising visions of goodness and blessings. Interpretation of the dream That my daughter has alopecia, symbolizes the girl’s proposal in the near future to someone she wants

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the name Munira in a dream?

preview.html: The name Munira in a dream The name Munira is one of the distinctive names that has a great position among people, it would be nice to see the name Munira in a dream or there is another unclear meaning and in the following lines we will explain the interpretations so that the reader is not distracted between different points of view, read with us to find out everything new. The name Munira in a dream Interpretation of a dream about the name Munira for a woman indicates enjoying good qualities and good behavior among people, and the name Munira in a dream symbolizes the sleeper's closeness to a beautiful girl and will live with her in love. And tenderness and compensation for what he went through in the past in his life and being satisfied with caring for his vague future. Seeing the name Munira in a dream indicates the good news that the girl will learn in the coming period and the name Munira in the dreamer's sleep indicates the transformations that occur in his life and may be a business trip abroad until he reaches his desires. In life and succeeds. The name Munira in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing the name Munira in a dream indicates the good and beautiful qualities that the dreamer enjoys and his good behavior among his family and those around him, and the name Munira in a dream for a girl indicates the comfort and security she lives. As a result of avoiding mistakes and distancing herself from bad friends. Seeing the name Munira in a woman's dream symbolizes the end of the disputes and problems invented by her haters and those who resented her for her safe and stable life, and the name Munira in a young man's dream translates into an improvement in her financial condition. So that he can get what he wants as soon as possible. The Secrets of Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just type a site about the secrets of dream interpretation Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. The name Munira in the dream of an unmarried woman Seeing the name Munira in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will receive a series of happy news that she will know in the coming days and the name Munira in a girl's dream symbolizes her imminent marriage to a young man of good morals and religion and she will live with him in safety and stability. Seeing the name Munira in a girl's dream indicates that she will get a big promotion in her work as a result of her diligence and dealing with difficult situations in an easy and simple way. The name Munira in a married woman's dream Seeing the name Munira in a dream for a married woman means that she will know the news of her pregnancy in the coming period after she and her husband have waited for this event for a long time. Excellence and prosperity. The scenes of the name Munira in the dreamer's dream indicate her strong personality and her ability to reconcile being a mother and a working woman, achieving many wonderful achievements in both. The name Munira in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing the name Munira in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the ease of her birth and the end of the pain she suffered during the last months of pregnancy, and the name Munira in a woman's dream indicates that she gave birth to a healthy child. Free of any health problem. Seeing the name Munira in the house in a woman's dream symbolizes that her husband is helping her in this difficult period until she overcomes it and becomes better in the near future, and the name Munira in the dreamer's dream indicates happiness and joy

title: What is the interpretation of seeing leprosy in a dream for a single woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about leprosy for a single woman: Every girl is afraid when a leper appears before her in reality, so what will happen to her when he appears in a dream! The girl may wake up in a state of fear and panic, although she may not know the interpretation of seeing a leper in a dream. Therefore, we will explain it to you in detail. Interpretation of seeing a leper in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says: If leprosy appears in an unmarried woman’s dream, this indicates the presence of evil that will afflict that girl in her real life. Leprosy may be evidence of the presence of a person in this woman’s life. A girl causes harm to her, whether through actions or words that harm her reputation. Seeing a leper in a dream and killing him, but if the girl gets rid of him and kills him, this indicates escaping from these problems and crises that this girl was suffering from. Ibn Shaheen also believes that dreaming about this type of animal indicates that these The girl suffers from hatred and envy from the friends present in her life and she must be careful. Interpretation of seeing a leper in a dream for a single woman Ibn KathirIbn Kathir says that lepers often represent the other partner in the dream, and this partner is often deceitful and deceitful, and the girl must beware of that. What What does leprosy mean in a dream? If a girl is not currently in a relationship with a young man, then seeing him in a dream indicates the advancement of one of the young men who may show respect and politeness on the outside, but it is completely the opposite on the inside. And she must be careful. Ibn Kathir believes that leprosy in a girl’s dream can indicate that she has committed some sins and transgressions for which she needs to repent. Interpretation of seeing leprosy in a dream for a single woman from Nablus. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, Google is an Egyptian website specializing in dream interpretation. It says Al-Nabulsi: The multiple appearance of geckos in a girl’s dream more than once is a warning sign for that girl from those around her, whether at work or study. If the girl is afraid of the appearance of a leper in her dream, this indicates that this girl will be exposed to some problems that she will not be able to escape from. Interpretation of seeing leprosy in a dream for an unmarried woman by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that the appearance of lepers in a girl’s dream indicates that this girl is neglecting her religion and abandoning worship and obedience. As for seeing him inside this girl’s house, this indicates the presence of family problems in her home. Interpretation of seeing a leper in a dream for an unmarried woman Married to Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing an unmarried woman with leprosy in a dream as evidence of the many problems she was suffering from in her life at that time and her inability to solve them greatly bothers her. If the dreamer sees a leper in her dream, this is a sign of anxiety that is controlling her because she cannot Achieving any of the goals that she was pursuing. If the dreamer sees a leprosy in her dream, this indicates bad changes that will occur in her life, which will make her feel very sad. Seeing a leper in her dream symbolizes that she will receive a marriage offer from someone who does not suit her at all and she will not be happy. In her life with him at all. So

title: What are the meanings and interpretations of seeing peace in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about peace: Peace or a handshake is evidence of mutual love between the two parties. It is also evidence of peace and good treatment. It is worth noting that peace in a dream has different images and appears in more than one situation. From others. A handshake or a greeting in a dream. Al-Nabulsi confirmed that a greeting or a handshake in a dream indicates an agreement between the dreamer and the other person in the dream, and that a greeting in a dream symbolizes a promise and commitment to it. When a debtor’s dreamer shakes hands with the person from whom the debt was taken, this is evidence of the dreamer’s livelihood, which His debts will be taken from him and his debts will be paid. When a righteous dreamer, known for his piety, dreams of shaking hands with a young man known for his immorality, this is evidence that the dreamer will invite that young man to walk in the path of righteousness and guidance. When the monarch greets an unknown religious man, this is evidence that the monarch will be protected from God’s injustice and torment. But if he sees If a single man exchanges greetings with a well-known religious man, this is evidence of his marriage. Contract with a beautiful girl.If a well-known dreamer sees in reality that he is an experienced trader and sees that he is shaking hands with his trading partners, this is evidence of new agreements and projects that will succeed between them in the future, and if he sees that. A dream in which he reached out to one of his partners, but they did not exchange greetings, is evidence of the failure of the relationship between them, or that he lost one of his business deals. When the dreamer sees that he is shaking hands with people he does not know in reality, this is a sign that guests will enter his house, and these guests will be people New in his life. If the dreamer sees himself exchanging greetings with someone he knows in reality, this indicates that the dreamer is constantly extending his hand to his mercy. Interpretation of a dream of greeting someone who is quarreling with him. If the dreamer shakes hands in a dream with a man between whom there was enmity and a long-term quarrel, this is evidence of The time for this hostility to end and good relations between them to return is approaching. An enemy is one who comes to the monarch in reality and asks for his forgiveness. If the dreamer shakes hands with a quarreling person in the dream, knowing that the quarrel was due to the fortuneteller’s cruel and unfair treatment of this person, the vision confirms the dreamer’s remorse for what he did with his actions and at this time he regrets it. procedures. Bad behavior towards him, and a feeling of guilt fills his heart and hurts him in waking life and the desire to get rid of her. If the dreamer sees someone arguing with them in a dream, and there is a long-standing estrangement between them in waking life, and he shakes his hand and kisses him, then this is a strong sign of the dreamer’s desire to reconcile with her. This person is in waking life. But he is afraid that he will refuse to deal with him again, but some jurists said that if the dreamer accepts this person without any rejection from him, then this is a sign of the success of the dreamer’s plan to end the quarrel between them. If the dreamer quarrels with someone in waking life and sees him begin reconciliation in the dream, then it is It is possible that this dream expresses an increase in problems and quarrels between them in waking life. Interpretation of peace for relatives in a dream: This scene shows many positive associations. If the dreamer shakes hands with his father or mother, this is a sign of their obedience and kindness

If the dreamer shakes hands with a quarreling person in the dream, knowing that the quarrel was due to the fortuneteller’s cruel and unfair treatment of this person, the vision confirms the dreamer’s remorse for what he did with his actions and at this time he regrets it. procedures. Bad behavior towards him, and a feeling of guilt fills his heart and hurts him in waking life and the desire to get rid of her. If the dreamer sees someone arguing with them in a dream, and there is a long-standing estrangement between them in waking life, and he shakes his hand and kisses him, then this is a strong sign of the dreamer’s desire to reconcile with her. This person is in waking life. But he is afraid that he will refuse to deal with him again, but some jurists said that if the dreamer accepts this person without any rejection from him, then this is a sign of the success of the dreamer’s plan to end the quarrel between them. If the dreamer quarrels with someone in waking life and sees him begin reconciliation in the dream, then it is It is possible that this dream expresses an increase in problems and quarrels between them in waking life. Interpretation of peace for relatives in a dream: This scene shows many positive associations. If the dreamer shakes hands with his father or mother, this is a sign of their obedience and kindness

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing plants in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing planting sprayed in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing planting sprayed in a dream indicates happy news, achieving a glorious future, achieving goals and aspirations, success and experience in study or work. Agriculture is the basic element that provides human food and produces plant and animal crops that benefit Human, and therefore we will explain to you the most important interpretation of the dream of seeing seedlings in a dream. Follow us. Seeing Ibn Sirin planting If you see yourself watering a plant or a plant with water in a dream, this means marriage soon. And seeing a man watering a green plant or plant with water, shows his children the abundance of blessings, the abundance of livelihood, and human charity. Seeing him in a dream that he is spraying the plants, because his vision symbolizes Stress and anxiety will disappear, and circumstances will change for the better, God willing. Also, seeing a plant being watered can mean that its owner is known to lie, which he uses to get what he wants from people. Just as the dream interpretation of spraying crops explains that this vision also indicates business Good deeds that people need and benefit from. Just as a married man sees in his dream that he is watering plants or spraying them with water, his vision means that his wife will become pregnant soon. As for a man who sees in his dreams that he is watering the garden, his vision shows the money that he will receive from his wife. Seeing watering Or spraying agriculture with water in a dream symbolizes intercourse between spouses. Seeing green agriculture spray Seeing him watering or spraying plants is a reflection of the dreamer’s condition and the situation he is in in reality whether at work or in the family field, and it also indicates travel soon. Seeing a married man watering this A green plant means that he should teach his children the Holy Qur’an and bring them closer to God. As for a woman who dreams of watering green plants, this indicates that she will earn a lot of money. A woman who does not have children and who sees herself watering a rabbit in a dream indicates a short pregnancy period. Walking among green farms and eating fruits is a sign that the dreamer can easily get money. Considering planting sprays for pregnant women. Seeing a dream about spraying green plants for a pregnant woman indicates that she will give birth easily without any problems and everything she wishes for will come true. Seeing a pregnant woman on a green farm is interpreted As the birth of a healthy child. The interpretation of a dream about seeing a plant in a pregnant woman’s dream also indicates that her child will have great luck in his health, wealth, and scientific knowledge. A dream about walking among plants: To see yourself walking among plants and trees and eating fruit means that you can access a lot of money or travel. Seeing yourself walking among plants in a dream, especially green plants, can be interpreted as well-being, prosperity and piety. Seeing planting ground sprays Planting in a dream indicates huge nourishment and the fulfillment of desires and goals. Seeing crops watered or sprayed with water in a dream means marriage soon, and a married man sees in his dream that he is watering plants and sprinkling water, so his vision indicates that his wife will become pregnant, and watering the plants indicates...

title: Interpretation of seeing cracked heels in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a cracked heel in a dream or a dream via the website roy2a.com Seeing broken legs in a dream means worry, grief, grief, and sadness that the dreamer faces, and it may indicate the cancellation of a girl’s engagement and the pregnant woman’s troubled birth, and for some pregnant women and divorced women. Imams such as Imam Ibn Shirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and other preachers of the modern era, so please follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing a crack in the heel of the foot in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin: Seeing a cracked heel in a dream indicates the pains and tribulations in which the monarch finds himself. Seeing a fracture in the foot Legs in a dream refers to the many problems and obstacles that the viewer faces. Seeing peeling skin of the legs indicates many problems and bad luck. Seeing cracked heels in a dream indicates distress and distress such as marital problems and financial distress. See also: Interpretation of watching football in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream? Broken heel for a single woman: Seeing cracked heels in a single woman’s dream shows how difficult it is to get what she wants. If an unmarried girl sees that the skin on her feet is falling off, this indicates not obtaining an academic qualification or canceling her employment. If a virgin sees that her skin is falling off, this indicates distress and adversity. See also: Interpretation of seeing a broken heel in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream of a broken heel for a married woman: Seeing a cracked heel in a married woman’s dream indicates many problems, marital quarrels, insomnia, and anxiety. If a married woman sees her feet falling, this indicates problems and quarrels with her husband, and may indicate Many sins and disobedience. If a married woman sees that her skin is cracked, this indicates misfortune and disaster and may indicate a lack of financial resources. See also: Interpretation of seeing a wound in the leg in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream about breaking a heel for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams that her feet are skinned Peeling, this indicates the fluctuating work and difficulties faced by the pregnant woman. If the pregnant woman sees cracks in her legs in a dream, this indicates that she is suffering from pain and fatigue during pregnancy and childbirth. Seeing fractures in the legs in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a sick or disabled child. See also: Interpretation of seeing a snake bite in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream of a broken heel for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees that the skin on her feet is falling off in a dream, it shows many problems and difficulties that she faces. Seeing a cracked heel in the final dream is that it indicates many trials and tribulations in life. A woman’s life. A vision of peeling skin in a divorced dream indicates exposure to adversity and danger. What is the interpretation of a dream of cutting a heel for a single woman: Seeing cut heels shows a lot of worries, problems, and troubles that the girl is exposed to. Seeing a cracked foot indicates a failed relationship or cancellation of the engagement. See also: Interpretation Seeing a wheelchair in a dream: Interpretation of the soles of the feet in a dream: Seeing the soles of the feet without deformities indicates overcoming adversity and difficulties. Seeing cracked feet or defects on the soles of the feet in a dream mentions

title: Interpretation of seeing a dream about fat in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: Fat is often next to meat and is what gives the meat its fat and flavour, so seeing fat in a dream is one of the dreams that carries many different meanings that differ from one person to another depending on the dreamer. Dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream about a hat in a dream. Interpretation of seeing fat in a dream for one girl. Dream interpreters say that an unmarried girl who eats fat in a dream is one of the signs that this girl will marry a rich man who will fulfill all the dreams she wishes for. If the dreamer is looking About a good job opportunity, eating white fat promises her that she will find a prestigious job through which she can fulfill all her desires. Fat in a dream for a girl who is studying is one of the signs of her academic excellence this year. Some interpreters believe that a girl who eats fat in a dream indicates that this girl She will reach distinguished positions in her current job. Interpretation of a dream about pumpkin in a dream. The meaning of eating fat in a dream. Dream interpreters confirm that a man who eats a lot of fat in a dream is one of the signs of the abundance of food and abundant money that this man will obtain in the coming days. It could be that eating Fat for a man is a sign of getting rid of health problems and crises that the dreamer is suffering from. Eating fat in a dream for a man indicates that this man will receive an inheritance or a lot of unexpected money in the near future. The fat that a person who suffers from worries and worries eats from Signs of the end of these worries and getting rid of them. Interpretation of seeing a black cat in a dream. What the interpreters said about fat in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman eats fat in a dream with her husband and children, this indicates the blessing of diet and the blessing in raising children with that woman. If the dreamer is Suffering from a delay in childbearing, eating lard in a dream is one of the signs of this woman’s imminent pregnancy. Some dream interpreters believe that a married woman eating lard in a dream could be one of the signs that this woman has gone through a difficult financial phase that she went through in the previous days. If the dreamer is pregnant, then eating fat in the dream may be a sign of the birth of a male child for this woman. Interpretation of a dream about cats in a dream. Indications of the appearance of fat in a dream for a divorced woman. Dream interpreters believe that a divorced woman who eats fat in a dream will marry a man. Valid in the coming days. Ibn Sirin says that a divorced woman buying fat indicates an improvement in her economic conditions in the next stage of her life. If a divorced woman dreams that her family is fat, this means that her family will stand by her side after the divorce crisis and help her escape from her worries and sorrows. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a kiss or being kissed in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a kiss or being kissed in a dream by Ibn Sirin The interpretation of a kiss varies according to the emotion that controls the person in his dream, and we will learn other details when interpreting his dream about seeing a kiss or being kissed in. A dream by Ibn Sirin in this article. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a kiss by Ibn Sirin. Interpretations of this dream may differ depending on the person’s feeling when performing the kiss and according to the details of the dream itself. We will now discuss in detail the most important interpretations that Ibn Sirin arrived at as follows: Ibn Sirin believes that an inch in a dream symbolizes a person’s need for affection, love, attention, and appreciation. As well as the constant search for feelings, sensations, and emotions, which in turn frees him from the scourges of the world. In addition, it gives him energy. To face the difficulties and problems of life. If the dreamer sees that there are people kissing in a dream, this means that he is interfering and monitoring the lives of others. In addition, he wants to know many other details about their personal lives, and therefore be an unacceptable person to them. Seeing kisses in a dream for a son Sirin denotes marriage and intimate relationships. Specifically if the kiss is accompanied by high emotions and lust. The kiss also symbolizes the intensity of the relationship or spiritual bond between the person who initiates the kiss and the person who receives it. And the presence of interactions between them. Seeing a kiss with him can be a sign of agreements or Cooperation in various businesses. Or this vision can indicate the conclusion of a profitable and successful deal at the same time. A kiss, if not accompanied by strong feelings and lust, indicates the satisfaction of needs, but also the fulfillment of requirements and goals. In addition, it indicates a tender And helping those in need as much as possible. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a kiss. See also: Interpretation of dreams about someone I know kissing me on the cheek in a dream. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of kissing in a dream. Many people see the exchange of kisses in their dreams and do not know the interpretation of this vision, which has many different meanings. Here we will refer to Ibn Shaheen’s opinion of Through the following points: Ibn Shaheen believes that kissing in a dream symbolizes closeness in relationships, as well as closeness to oneself and increased confidence. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is kissing someone, this indicates his desire to be gentle and close to him. While watching others in a dream They are in a kissing position. This indicates an urgent desire to know people’s details. Seeing the official boss kissing is a sign of closeness with him, with the aim of sharing interests with him on the ground. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a kiss. See also: Interpretation of a dream about kissing the king in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a kiss from A familiar person in a dream: A kiss means that it is a form of expressing the feeling and feeling of love and longing for the other party. As for the dream of exchanging a kiss with a familiar person, there is no doubt that this dream has interpretations, which are: as follows: If the husband sees himself exchanging a kiss with his wife intensely in a dream, this indicates On the size and strength of the love, attention and affection that exists between them.
